backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing control layout and event log, exposing queries and updates to save layouts and record or filter events.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing feature evidence linking specific frontend files to a UI consistency requirement with related components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries mapping frontend file paths to their roles in the control panel application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling including dark theme variables, control visuals, fullscreen workspace rules, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that loads the React application root and sets dark mode on the document.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app applying theme settings and rendering the control panel with a notification toaster.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Ad: Modal for creating new controls with validation, default values, and radio-group configuration options.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Co: Provider managing control layout state, syncing with backend, and exposing CRUD operations for controls.
Renders interactive controls (button, toggle, slider, radio) and emits backend events on user interactions.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Cr: Renders an Add Control button with tooltip messaging, enabling the control-creation modal only in initialized edit mode.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Dr: Wraps a control with draggable positioning logic and selection handling, updating layout coordinates during drag.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Fu: Provides a button to enter or exit fullscreen mode for a referenced workspace element with fallback error handling.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Im: Allows exporting the current layout as JSON and importing a layout file, showing validation errors if import fails.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/In: Displays and edits properties of the selected control, allowing ID changes, type switching, radio option editing, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Mo: Toggles between edit and runtime modes, switching button style and icon accordingly.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Re: Shows a scrollable list of recently emitted signals with timestamps and provides a refresh button.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Wo: Renders all controls inside a workspace, wrapping each in draggable behavior when in edit mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlLayout.ts: Defines context and hook for managing control layout state, selection, creation, updates, deletion, and import/export.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullscreen.ts: Provides fullscreen state tracking and functions to enter, exit, and toggle fullscreen for a given element.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanelMode.ts: Manages edit/runtime mode state with localStorage persistence and a toggle function.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentSignals.ts: Fetches recent backend events using react-query, polling every 5 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignalEmitter.ts: Provides a mutation to emit control signals via the actor and refresh recent events, with error toasts.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, fullscreen workspace styling, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/binaryCode.ts: Validates binary strings and generates deterministic 8‑bit codes from seeds.
frontend/src/lib/controlDefaults.ts: Provides default configuration values for various control types.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Implements JSON file download by creating a Blob and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/lib/layoutSerialization.ts: Validates, exports, and imports control panel layout JSON with detailed field checks.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
Renders the main control panel UI with workspace, inspector, signals, import/export, and mode-dependent layout.
frontend/src/types/controlPanel.ts: Defines TypeScript types for control configurations and layout structures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, plugins, and dark mode behavior.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state and metadata, including a fix request to align the new‑tab draft UI with the in‑Caffeine draft. Lists one existing feature tied to this UI‑consistency requirement and notes a known layout discrepancy.
